pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kose Font (小赖字体 / Xiaolai) is an open-source Chinese font derived from the Kose font. This is a Chinese serif font suitable for body text and titles. The font includes two variants: Xiaolai-Regular and XiaolaiMono-Regular (monospace version).
小赖字体是一款衍生于 Kose 字体的开源中文字体。这是一款适合正文 和标题的中文衬线字体。字体包含两个变体：Xiaolai-Regular（小赖常规体） 和 XiaolaiMono-Regular（等宽版本）。
